body:
Hi guys,

I've been noticing cth (Control the Hill) has been becoming
more popular ever since the update. If you haven't tried
he game out, I recommend you do, since it is a very fun
game. I am not trying to advertise, but I want to encourage
everyone to try it out because I feel like not many people 
have played it before.

Thanks xx

Let me know what you think about CTH, I really would
like to know

sorry if this is a weird post xD
body_tagged:

title: Control the Hill

replies.body: This game used to be pretty popular a while ago, so it's pretty good to see it slowly reviving. I'm also amongst that small group of people that'll play CTH whenever possible. +1
replies.body_tagged: This game used to be pretty popular a while ago, so it's pretty good to see it slowly reviving. I'm also amongst that small group of people that'll play CTH whenever possible. +1

replies.body: Kinda sad that it took until now for people to play CTH. It was one of the only gamemodes I played since I joined the server.  Glad people have finally started to enjoy it.
replies.body_tagged: Kinda sad that it took until now for people to play CTH. It was one of the only gamemodes I played since I joined the server.  Glad people have finally started to enjoy it.

replies.body: Yeah, it's nice to have a match open most of the time. It's a year overdue for a map update, so we should get to that =P
replies.body_tagged: Yeah, it's nice to have a match open most of the time. It's a year overdue for a map update, so we should get to that =P

replies.body: I'm glad CTH (I said TS on accident -_-) started to get more people. Some of the regular CTH players have started playing again
replies.body_tagged: I'm glad CTH (I said TS on accident -_-) started to get more people. Some of the regular CTH players have started playing again

replies.body: I believe I preferred it with the good old fashioned unlocks, but It's still great fun & I'm really glad to see It's rise to popularity again :D
replies.body_tagged: I believe I preferred it with the good old fashioned unlocks, but It's still great fun & I'm really glad to see It's rise to popularity again :D

replies.body: I'm starting to really enjoy Control the hill
replies.body_tagged: I'm starting to really enjoy Control the hill

replies.body: Control the Hill and Capture the Wool are the best gamemodes IMO. I'm glad that it is gaining more attention.
replies.body_tagged: Control the Hill and Capture the Wool are the best gamemodes IMO. I'm glad that it is gaining more attention.

replies.body:
I believe CTH has the flat hit glitch.
Also with Demo in it can you get tnt and a grenade whenever you kill someone?
replies.body_tagged:
I believe CTH has the flat hit glitch.
Also with Demo in it can you get tnt and a grenade whenever you kill someone?

replies.body: Demo would then be way too OP. It'd just be continuously blowing up low health players from the side line.
replies.body_tagged: Demo would then be way too OP. It'd just be continuously blowing up low health players from the side line.

replies.body: That's a good point, but demo does not have enough tnt/grenades IMO.
replies.body_tagged: That's a good point, but demo does not have enough tnt/grenades IMO.

replies.body: It's borderline OP as it is. And that's saying a lot because it was recently nerfed.
replies.body_tagged: It's borderline OP as it is. And that's saying a lot because it was recently nerfed.

reply_to.body: That's a good point, but demo does not have enough tnt/grenades IMO.
reply_to.body_tagged: That's a good point, but demo does not have enough tnt/grenades IMO.

replies.body: DTM was just such a good game for me, I never really wanted to switch to other games, but when I tried it this update, I don't know why I wasn't hooked on it a year ago when I first tried it. Love this game!
replies.body_tagged: DTM was just such a good game for me, I never really wanted to switch to other games, but when I tried it this update, I don't know why I wasn't hooked on it a year ago when I first tried it. Love this game!

replies.body: I like CTH because you can kill 75% on those maps and not 50% like nexus
replies.body_tagged: I like CTH because you can kill 75% on those maps and not 50% like nexus
